BaseRules[1]: A-Rank or above character is guaranteed every 10 research attempts in Basic Mode.
BaseRules[2]: In Targeted Mode where you can select a character, an A-Rank or above character is guaranteed every 10 research attempts. You will have a better chance of getting the selected A-Rank character when you get an A-Rank character.
BaseRules[3]: Please check the relevant announcements for the implementation schedule of new A-Rank characters into Targeted Mode.
BaseRules[4]: In the targeted construct pool, the guarantee value of A-Rank and S-Rank constructs will not be affected when you change your selected construct, which means the guarantee progress is inherited.

RuleHint: <color=#FFFFFF><size=27>Every R&D x10 for guaranteed 1 </size></color>Special Reward<color=#FFFFFF><size=27> (Up to 5 Special Rewards)</size></color>
BaseRules[1]: All special rewards have limited quantities. They will no longer be available once they are drawn.
BaseRules[2]: There are two types of rewards: Special Reward and Normal Reward. Each draw will be determined by the rates.

RuleHint: <color=#FFFFFF><size=27>After receiving the special rewards</size></color>, the next mystery box will be unlocked
BaseRules[1]: A-Rank or above character is guaranteed every 10 research attempts in Basic Mode.
BaseRules[2]: In Target Mode where you can select a character, an A-Rank or above character is guaranteed every 10 research attempts. You will have a better chance of getting the selected A-Rank character when you get an A-Rank character.
BaseRules[3]: Please check the relevant announcements for the implementation schedule of new A-Rank characters into Target Mode.
BaseRules[4]: In the Construct Target Pool, the guaranteed attempt of pulling A-Rank and S-Rank Constructs will not be affected when you change your targeted construct, which means the guarantee progress is inherited.

BaseRules[2]: 1. Consume the Terminal Code to draw the pool for rewards.\n2. Every reward has a limit, and you will no longer receive the reward once its limit is reached. You are guaranteed to get all the rewards, including the coating [Volatile Priestess], within 50 draws!\n3. After the event ends, the remaining unused event token [Terminal Code] will be expired on 2022/8/5 8:01 (UTC)
BaseRules[3]:
Items will be removed from the prize pool once their limit is reached, and the chance to get the other items will increase.
Coating "Volatile Priestess" *1, limit: 1, chance on first draw: 0.8%
Event Construct R&D Ticket *2500, limit: 1, chance on first draw: 1.2%

Cogs *100000, limit: 10, chance on first draw: 18.6%
Overclock Material Box (β) *2, limit: 7, chance on first draw: 13.2%
Overclock Material Box (α) *3, limit: 7, chance on first draw: 15.62%
